properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 4:08PM PST until February 7 at 10:38PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Oregon...

Umatilla River near Gibbon affecting Umatilla County

The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Umatilla River near Gibbon.
* from late tonight to Friday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 3:15 PM Wednesday, the stage was 4.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 7.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by after midnight tomorrow and
continue to rise to near 9.7 feet by tomorrow late evening. The
river will fall below flood stage by Friday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown. Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility
vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow
for safe passage. As little as one foot of water on the road can move
most vehicles off the road.
